meanings.definition: A region in an organ or tissue that has suffered damage or injury
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the lesions on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: The lesions on the tree bark indicated disease.
meanings.sent3: The lesions on the banana peel made it look like a map.
meanings.sent4: The lesions on the road were like scars on the earth's surface.
meanings.sent5: The lesions on the old building told a story of its past struggles.

meanings.definition: An abnormal change in structure of an organ or tissue due to disease or injury
meanings.sent1: The lesions in the brain were causing memory problems.
meanings.sent2: The lesions in the lung were a result of smoking.
meanings.sent3: The lesions on the book cover made it look unique.
meanings.sent4: The lesions on the fabric altered its appearance dramatically.
meanings.sent5: The lesions on the painting added an interesting texture to it.
